<div ya-no-ui-slider="Object (any usual noUiSlider options goes here)" ya-no-ui-slider-disabled="Boolean" ya-no-ui-slider-handle1-disabled="Boolean" ya-no-ui-slider-handle2-disabled="Boolean" ya-no-ui-slider-events="Object (event name to single handler function)" ya-no-ui-slider-slide-debounce="Number || Infinity (use Infinity for disabling change on slide event)"></div> Example: $scope.options = { start: [20, 80], step: 10, margin: 20, connect: true, direction: 'rtl', orientation: 'vertical', behaviour: 'tap-drag', range: { 'min': 0, 'max': 100 }, pips: { mode: 'steps', density: 2 } } <div ya-no-ui-slider="options"></div>
